ShortDescription.Value: Overlay an image on the game map

LongDescription.Value: Images go in the 'Overlays' directory in your C:S II user settings directory. Select the image from the mod's options panel. Control-O to toggle the overlay in-game. Control-. (period) and Control-, (comma) to rotate the overlay. Shift-arrow keys to move in 10m increments, control-arrow keys to move in 1m increments. Control-PageUp and Control-PageDown to raise/lower the image overlay.
